name: replay
description: Historical replay engine. Replays all FeedEater messages at accelerated speed, preserving chronological ordering across venues. Measures cross-venue lead-lag for matched events.

jobs.name: replay
jobs.description: Replay historical messages onto NATS at accelerated speed. Requires start_time and end_time in job data.

jobs.name: leadLagReport
jobs.description: Generate cross-venue lead-lag report from event-resolver mappings. Requires start_time and end_time in job data.

settings.description: JSON array of module names to filter (empty = all modules)
